description.value:
Requirements You just used the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.zJ3Jakto3oqJTLZR]{Limit Break} action, and you are wielding a ranged weapon.

Your ability to find the perfect angle on your target is unmatched and you take advantage of your position to devastating effect. Stride once, make three ranged Strikes, and Stride again to your initial position.

You reload your weapon for free between each strike and both the movements and Strikes do not provoke reactions. You ignore all flat checks to hit your target, as well as all cover your target might have. After this Limit Break resolves, all of your attacks until the end of the turn are made at a -10 multiple attack penalty, even if you are wielding an agile weapon or have another effect which reduces multiple attack penalty.
